info.title: Doctor evil. A 67-year-old professor of philosophy opened fire at U.S. University
info.short_text: Professor Anthony Polito has long and unsuccessfully tried to get back to work.

info.title: Four victims in the Mi-8 crash in Kirgizia are in reanimation.
info.short_text: Eight people were injured and one died.

info.title: MO Kirgizia: in the crash of MI-8, a man died during the training flight
info.short_text: Eight more people were injured.

info.title: In Belgorod, five teenagers were detained for assaults on others
info.short_text: An adult suspect is being sought.

info.title: The court sent a man behind bars planning to blow the Uralvagonzavod.
info.short_text: In Ekaterinburg, a citizen of Ukraine was sentenced for attempted terrorist attack in Lower Tagil.

info.title: MI-8 military helicopter crashed into Kirgizia
info.short_text: One person is known for death.

info.title: The actor's sleeping with his heart. Developments in Moscow and the region by the morning of 17 January
info.short_text: Fighting, theft and fire: events in the region, in aif.ru.

info.title: Five people were affected by an emergency with gas in Chelabin province
info.short_text: Among them, a 16-year-old teenager was injured.

info.title: On Urale, an excavator with the body of a typist was discovered.
info.short_text: A 39-year-old excavator driver died in Northuralsk.

info.title: In Achinsk, two men are charged with the murder of a 75-year-old creditor from Armenia
info.short_text: An old man borrowed one of the killers about 1 million roubles, and he was killed to keep them from returning.

info.title: The residents of the Altai province were detained in the case concerning the financing of terrorism
info.short_text: The man decided to assist the Ukrainian paramilitary unit with the purchase of military equipment for fighting against the FM.

info.title: In 2023, 240 million telephones and 123 million e-mails were leaked
info.short_text: Year earlier, the figures were lower.

info.title: Sverdlov Police closed counterfeit alcohol production units
info.short_text: The production point was equipped in a private house.

info.title: Criminal proceedings were instituted for the execution of children at the Yakutsk boarding school
info.short_text: Investigators conducted research, investigation to determine the circumstances and causes.

info.title: Glads: The PSB system has again defeated the target over Belgorod.
info.short_text: According to preliminary data, no one was injured.

info.title: ABC: The head of the Pentagon Austin called for an ambulance without a flashlight
info.short_text: Politician called an ambulance without a siren to avoid attracting attention.

info.title: FROD: In the Belgorod region, four Ukrainian drones were hit.
info.short_text: The air defence forces also destroyed seven VSO rockets fired across the region.

info.title: Mary Belgorod: the city has declared a missile danger
info.short_text: It is recommended that residents remain at home.

info.title: The blasts were spread in the Dnipropetrov region
info.short_text: Aerial alarm has been declared in several Ukrainian regions.

info.title: Damn mountains. The Turkish resort takes the lives of a tourist in one scheme.
info.short_text: Two deaths on the Turkish resort are very similar: one age women, both lived in luxury hotels, both went on vacation alone, and for both, this trip was rocky.
